about_the_game:
Gather valuable resources, explore uncharted territories, and unlock even more opportunities for survival. Forests, mountains, and hidden caves hold not only threats but also materials
essential for crafting tools, building shelters, and ensuring your safety in the wilderness.

Explore a vast open world filled with deadly dangers and limitless possibilities. Build shelters, gather resources, and find ways to survive using your skills and ingenuity. Every discovery becomes a step toward making this harsh world your home.


Become a true hunter in the wild: track your prey to secure food and valuable resources. From small game to larger predators, every hunt requires strategy and precision. Use the materials you gather to craft weapons, tools, and upgrade your equipment to improve your chances of survival.

  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit version 1909, revision .1350
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Dive into a harsh open world where every choice can mean the difference between life and death. Explore untamed lands, build shelters, hunt, craft tools, and defend yourself from threats. Nature, weather, and unexpected events will test your will to survive.
